First, load in data.
```{r,echo=F}
source("R source/BDVis.R")
data<-readRDS("R source/data.RDS")
```

Visualize age distribution.

```{r,echo=F}
age.vis(data[,getcolumn("age",data)])
```

Visualize Gender.

```{r,echo=F}
gender.df<-as.data.frame(table(data$gender.factor))
cat.vis.donut(gender.df)
```
